SELECT rf.refund_id, rf.refund_id AS validate_id, rf.refund_num, oo.order_num, it.product_id, it.product_name, it.product_img, it.spec_content, rf.refund_money, rf.create_time, rf.refund_type, rf.state, rf.user_id, rf.user_name, se.express_name, ie.express_code FROM weiit_order_refund rf INNER JOIN weiit_order oo ON rf.order_num= oo.order_num INNER JOIN weiit_order_item it ON rf.order_item_id = it.id LEFT JOIN weiit_shop_express se ON rf.express_template_id = se.id LEFT JOIN weiit_init_express_ali ie ON se.express_id = ie.express_id WHERE 1=1
and rf.refund_num like concat('%', #{refund_num}, '%')
and oo.order_num like concat('%', #{order_num}, '%')
and rf.user_name like concat('%', #{user_name}, '%')
and rf.state =#{state}
and date(rf.create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(rf.create_time) <= date(#{endTime})
and rf.shop_id=#{shop_id}
order by rf.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into weiit_user_balance_log (user_id, user_name, balance, last_balance, remark, type, state, origin_id, create_time, update_time, shop_id) values (#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{balance}, #{last_balance}, #{remark}, #{type}, #{state}, #{origin_id}, now(), now(), #{shop_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE weiit_user SET balance=#{last_balance}, update_time=now() WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
